name: validmind-toc
description: Generate table of contents for Jupyter notebooks.

validmind.toc.tableOfContentsHeader.markdownDescription: **Defines the name for the table of contents**

validmind.toc.autoSave.markdownDescription:
Automatically save the notebook after creating, updating, or deleting the table of contents	

Disabled by default to let VS Code complitly control documents saving

validmind.toc.numbering.markdownDescription:
Enumerate headers of the jupyther notebook	

Option is overridable by TOC cell options	

If you allready have enumerated titles such numbering will be replaced

validmind.toc.flat.markdownDescription:
Flat table of contents without intendentions and list markers	

It will better looks when use it with `#validmind.toc.numbering#` is enabled	

Option is overridable by TOC cell options

validmind.toc.anchors.markdownDescription:
Add links from the table of contents elements to the headers in the document	

Option is overridable by TOC cell options

markdownEnumDescriptions:
### [Title](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc)
Using whole title as reverse link

If some of titles allready have links such titles will be displayed with `arrow1` style, like
### [Title](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc) [↑](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc)
or
### Title [with](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc) links [↑](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc)

### Title [↑](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc)
Adding arrow up reverse link after title

### [↑](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc) Title
Adding arrow up reverse link before title

### Title [▲](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc)
Adding arrow up reverse link after title

### [▲](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc) Title
Adding arrow up reverse link before title

### Title [☝](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=xelad0m.jupyter-toc)
Adding custom symbol for reverse link
validmind.toc.reverseAnchorsStyle.markdownDescription:
Style of reverse links from notebook headers to the table of contents.	

This option works when `#validmind.toc.anchors#` is enabled

validmind.toc.customReverseAnchor.markdownDescription:
Defines anchor symbol or string to use as link from headers to the table of contents.	

For example by default it is ☝ (finger up)	

This option works when `#validmind.toc.anchors#` is enabled and `#validmind.toc.reverseAnchorsStyle#` set to `custom`

validmind.toc.minHeaderLevel.markdownDescription:
Defines the **minimum** level of the notebook headers to be collected in the table of contents	

Option is overridable by TOC cell options

validmind.toc.maxHeaderLevel.markdownDescription:
Defines the **maximum** level of the notebook headers to be collected in the table of contents	

Option is overridable by TOC cell options

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
